full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Expansion Joints

---

## Tender Details

### Solicitation Number
W8482-241650/A

### Tender Reference
CB-6177-46369683 (rev 1)

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the procurement of expansion joints for pipe installation. The tender is issued under a request for proposal (RFP) and is open to all qualified bidders.

### Item Specifications

* Expansion Joint, Pipe (GSIN 4730, NSN 99-157-9410)
	+ Part No. RB 9318/0600, NCAGE K6455 (Quantity: 36, Unit of Issue: Each)
	+ Part No. PA 1948, NCAGE 36718 (Quantity: 36, Unit of Issue: Each)
		- To be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
		- To be delivered to CFB Halifax

### Important Notes

* Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE offered.
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Tender Posting Information

* Notice URL: [ webpage ]
* Notice Date: 2023-06-08
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-17 (at 14:00)
* Notice Attachment: PDF readme
